lead_paragraph: For Luciana Santos, doing her part in Brazil's fight to control the mosquito that spreads the Zika virus, dengue and other diseases is as easy as a couple of clicks on her smartphone.

headline.main: App Helps in Brazil's Fight Against Zika-Spreading Mosquito
headline.print_headline: App Helps in Brazil's Fight Against Zika-Spreading Mosquito

snippet: For Luciana Santos, doing her part in Brazil's fight to control the mosquito that spreads the Zika virus, dengue and other diseases is as easy as a couple of clicks on her smartphone.
